name: Old Yeller: The Game
description:
There comes a day in a persons life where you have to put your dog down, and this is that day...  

Over the span of 5 levels, you must silence the yelling that has been terrorizing your people for decades.

The critically acclaimed Old Yeller book and movie franchise can now be experienced in the unofficial electronic game, Old Yeller: The Game!

=Controls=

Movement - WASD

Shoot/Menu - Left Mouse Button

Sprint - Shift

Reload - R

Toggle Full Screen - Enter (window mode is a little wonky with the window size)

Exit - Escape

WARNING: SOME YELLERS ARE OLDER THAN OTHERS AND THEREFOR MORE DANGEROUS

This is a game made for the #lowresjam with a 64x64 screen resolution.
